title: My 6 Month Experiment with Chinese Farmers Changed Everything | Organic Cultivation Technology

subtasks: Planting sprouts with precision spacing (1-1.5 meters)
Regularly maintaining guava trees through trimming
Preventing nutrient competition by removing grass
Wrapping individual guavas for quality control
Protecting wrapped fruits from birds, insects, rain, and excessive sun using nylon bags
Pruning branches to direct nutrients to fruits
Checking sweetness and maturity for harvest
Harvesting fruits carefully using scissors, arranging in trays, removing stems, washing, and wrapping with foam
Transporting packaged guavas to distribution centers
Observing skilled guava cutting and peeling techniques
Appreciation of guava flavor and preparation
